history.text: The Notebook is one of my all time favorite love story movies
It really gave Ryan Gosling and Rachel McAdams their starting point into movie stardom
Yes I think they both did a great job acting in the movie
I almost didn't recognize Rachel McAdams
Even better was that it followed the book very closely, unlike how most book to movie movies go. They kept it pretty true.
That's good to know. I haven't read the book, but after seeing the movie I want to
Its really good. Most of Nicholas Sparks' books to movies are like this. I have read a couple of his books and seen the movies.
What was the part of the movie that got to you the most?
After seeing this one I think I will watch some of the other movies adapted from his books.
The scene at the end with Gena Rowlands and James Garner. How about you?
That part made me cry. It is such a powerful scene. True loves until the end
It was. it was very well made. I would watch it again and again.
It was my first time watching it, but I would definitely watch again
Plus Noah's house! I love it. If I lived in South Carolina, thats the kind of house I would want
I was amazed that an abandoned house could look like that
